attributes.action: Publish yearly comprehensive details of all government income and expenditure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The obligation and duty to pay tax in its various forms, income tax, VAT, Duties, Licences et al, should be balanced by the absolute right to know exactly the amount derived from each of these sources and more importantly on what or whom it has been spent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
